Process Time

Intraday (before GMT 22:00) or the day after (after GMT 22:00 00). In case of a holiday or non-business day, the withdrawals will be postponed till the nearest business day.*

Deposit and Withdrawal Steps

Log in to MyBCR

Click "My Account" in the left-hand panel.

Click "My Deposit" or "My Withdrawal" button.

Pick preferred depositing or withdrawing method shown on the right

Follow the instructions and procedures

Join us as a journey

Sign up in minutes and start doing money right.
